name: THE RISING OF THE MACHINES -Ludum dare 39
name_original: THE RISING OF THE MACHINES -Ludum dare 39
description:
Hello and welcome to my first Ludum dare entry ever!

I made a game to the theme: Running out of Power.

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

Left-Mouse-Button to shoot.

Space to do a barrel-roll! (Important while fighting the first Boss!)

(The Game is maybe 10 minutes long, there is an ending after you finished the second boss.)

I hope you enjoy my game, have a great day!

(The Mac and Linux Version are NOT testet, if there is a bug, tell me about it)

My other game: https://greepybrainsdev.itch.io/dimension-switcher-v021

(Its a older game)
